B

BackupManager - Class in <Unnamed>
BackupManager is a thread started by the Server class that continuously checks the game state for any changes and if there are changes then it will send a backup to the backup server.
BackupManager(OutputStreamWriter, GameManager) - Constructor for class BackupManager
 
BackupServer - Class in <Unnamed>
This class is the main process for backups from the game server.

G

GameManager - Class in <Unnamed>
This class maintains the game state as well as containing the logic for most of the actions possible in a game.
GameManager() - Constructor for class GameManager
 
GameServer - Class in <Unnamed>
The class from the server that will set up a connection to a backup server if there is one and then will listen for client connections and create new GameThread threads to manage that client.
GameServer(String, int) - Constructor for class GameServer
 
GameThread - Class in <Unnamed>
The main processing thread on the server side for communications with a client.

S

Server - Class in <Unnamed>
The class from the server that will set up a connection to a backup server if there is one and then will listen for client connections and create new ServerThread threads to manage that client.

SERVER - Static variable in class Server
 
ServerThread - Class in <Unnamed>
Processes communications between a client and the game server that they are connected to.
